H0.text: What began when Bohemia revolted against the Habsburgs in 1618. The Great War

H1.text: What began when Bohemia revolted against the Habsburgs in 1618. The Protestant Reformation

H2.text: What began when Bohemia revolted against the Habsburgs in 1618. The Habsburg Dynasty

H3.text: What began when Bohemia revolted against the Habsburgs in 1618. TYW

A4.text: The war began in 1618, when the Catholic Emperor Ferdinand II was replaced as king of Bohemia by the Protestant Frederick V of the Palatinate.

A5.text: Combined with fears that the Protestant religion in general was threatened, these factors turned an internal dynastic dispute into a European conflict.
